biotools.summary:
An open-source Pythonic library to compute landscape metrics.

Open-source Python library to compute landscape metrics.

Example notebooks of the PyLandStats library.

Test and Deploy Your Code with Confidence.

Test Coverage History & Statistics.

PyLandStats documentation! — PyLandStats 2.0.0a1 documentation.

Citation: Bosch M. 2019. "PyLandStats: An open-source Pythonic library to compute landscape metrics". PLOS ONE, 14(12), 1-19. doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0225734.

Citation: Bosch M. 2019. "PyLandStats: An open-source Pythonic library to compute landscape metrics". Preprint available at bioRxiv. https://doi.org/10.1101/715052.

Test code coverage history for martibosch/pylandstats.

Open-source Pythonic library to compute landscape metrics within the PyData stack (NumPy, pandas, matplotlib...)
